text: The 1975 Campeonato Nacional de Futbol Profesional was Chilean top tier’s 43rd season. Unión Española was the tournament’s champion, winning its fourth title. ==Standings== ==Scores== ==Relegation play-off== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !!width="70"|Magallanes!!width="30"|0–1!!width="80"|Aviación |} Magallanes relegated to 1976 Segunda División == Topscorer == {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%; text-align:center;" |- !width="205"|Name !width="205"|Team !width="50"|Goals |- || Víctor Pizarro||Santiago Morning||27 |} ==Liguilla Pre-Copa Libertadores== \---- \---- == See also == * 1975 Copa Chile == References == == External links == *ANFP *RSSSF Chile 1975 Category:Primera División de Chile seasons Chile Prim
title: 1975 Primera División de Chile
